definition: person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Patients will be treated, and will be sent to compulsory treatment of drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 患病者將被收治，而吸毒者將被送強制戒毒。

sentences.english: Former RCA workers petitioned the Executive Yuan for compensation for pollution-related injuries.
sentences.chinese: 前RCA員工爲遭受污染而患病者向監察院請願索賠。

sentences.english: For those who are ill, illness is an internal form of disharmony.
sentences.chinese: 對患病者來說，疾病是身體形態內在的不協調。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
